definition: ferrous metals (i.e. iron, chromium, manganese and alloys containing them)
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on

sentences.english: This black metal plate is called a collector.
sentences.chinese: 这块黑色金属板被称为集热器。

sentences.english: Suitable for welding ferrous metal workpiece with general AC electrode.
sentences.chinese: 适合焊接黑色金属工件与一般交流电极。

sentences.english: The ferrous metals can be classified into steels, cast irons, and wrought irons.
sentences.chinese: 黑色金属可分为钢，铸铁和熟铁。

sentences.english: Ferrous Metal Foundries Industry in the U. S.
It should sound something like a black metal raspy voice.
sentences.chinese: 这听起来应该像黑色金属的刺耳声音。

sentences.english: It can be applied to determine the Brinell hardness for ferrous metal and non-ferrous metal.
sentences.chinese: 适用于黑色金属，有色金属的布氏硬度测定。

sentences.english: Carbon is found in almost all ferrous metals.
sentences.chinese: 几乎所有的黑色金属中都含有碳。

sentences.english: The experimental results show that chemical wear is dominant in diamond cutting of ferrous metals.
sentences.chinese: 化学磨损在金刚石刀具切削黑色金属时占主导地位。

sentences.english: Ferrous & Non-Ferrous Metals, Natural Rubber, Latex and Synthetic Rubber.
sentences.chinese: 有色与黑色金属，天然橡胶，乳胶。

sentences.english: Think of it as freedom of choice wrapped in black sheet-metal.
sentences.chinese: 是否要裹黑色金属片你自主选择。

sentences.english: Light stability, in the presence of organic matter reduction of the vulnerability of black metallic silver .
sentences.chinese: 在有机物存在时易被还原为黑色金属银。
